channel.title: Vagrant on IT技术分享
channel.description: Recent content in Vagrant on IT技术分享

item.title: Vagrant一些配置
item.description: # -*- mode: ruby -*- # vi: set ft=ruby : Vagrant.configure("2") do |config| config.vm.box = "ubuntu/xenial64" config.vm.box_check_update = false config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 3306, host: 3306 config.vm.network "private_network", ip: "192.168.10.5" config.vm.network "public_network", ip:"192.168.50.5", bridge:"en0: Wi-Fi (AirPort)" config.vm.synced_folder ".", "/vagrant", owner:"www-data", group:"www-data" config.vm.provider "virtualbox" do |vb| vb.memory = "2048" end end

item.title: php 开发环境等
item.description: 这个网站学习资料非常不错 http://www.phptherightway.com/ Vagrant会创建一些共享文件夹，用来给你在主机和虚拟机之间共享代码用。也就是说，你可以在主机上写好程序，然后在
